price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߝߘߎߡߊ ߟߎ߫ ߛߍ߲߬ߓߍ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߜߍ߬ߡߍ ߟߎ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߘߎߟߋ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: هُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُمۡ فِي ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: hum wa-azwājuhum fī ẓilālin ʿalā al-arāiki muttakiūna
